sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"分配，分发"之意。
means: assign ：指按照某种原则进行的硬性分配，也不一定是很公平的。
distribute ：通常指以整体或定量分为若干份来分配。
divide ：普通用词，侧重将某物分成若干份分配给他人，当某物一分为二时，含平均分配之意。
allocate ：主要指金钱、财产、权力或领土等的分配，着重分配的比例和专门用途。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"发行，发出，发给"之意。
means: issue ： 多指通过官方或正式渠道正式发行。
distribute ： 指把东西分发给所属者或应得者。
publish ： 普通用词，多指出版发行文字作品，也指发布新闻或发表见解等。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"传播，散播"之意。
means: spread ： 普通用词，使用广泛。指传播疾病、思想、文化、习惯或谣言等。
circulate ： 既指某物在一物体内循环流动，又可指在一定范围内传播物品、刊物或思想、语言等。
distribute ： 指把一定数量的东西分成若干等份进行分发。
propagate ： 指自觉地努力推广，也指宣传或散布。

sentence.Network_en: We didn't understand how difficult it was to distribute a national paper.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们不了解分销一份全国发行的报纸有多难。

sentence.Network_en: Distribute the topping evenly over the fruit.
sentence.Network_cn: 将配料均匀地撒在水果上。

sentence.Network_en: Distribute these pamphlets among them before you leave, will you?
sentence.Network_cn: 请你在离开之前把这些小册子发给他们好 吗 ?

list.abs: 它在分布式 (distributed)，可获取性 (availability)，可调控性 (scalability)，安全，标准化等诸多方面都有很强的表现。它包含三大产品.
...数除以二，一半用Linux，另一半用MS Windows就行了。分散式(Distributed)与集中式(Centralized)软件架构选择的例子可以说明平 …

英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... contributory a 有贡献的 distribution n 分配 distribute v 分配：区分.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin distribut- 'divided up', from the verb distribuere, from dis- 'apart' + tribuere 'assign'

entry.def: If you distribute things, you hand them or deliver them to a number of people.

example.ex: Students shouted slogans and distributed leaflets...
example.tran: 学生们喊着口号，分发着传单。

example.ex: Thousands of soldiers are working to distribute food and blankets to the refugees...
example.tran: 数以千计的士兵正在给难民们分发食物和毯子。

entry.def: When a company distributes goods, it supplies them to the shops or businesses that sell them.

example.ex: We didn't understand how difficult it was to distribute a national paper.
example.tran: 我们不了解分销一份全国发行的报纸有多难。

entry.def: If you distribute things among the members of a group, you share them among those members.

example.ex: Immediately after his election he began to distribute major offices among his friends and supporters.
example.tran: 他当选后立即着手将要职分派给他的朋友和支持者们。

entry.def: To distribute a substance over something means to scatter it over it.

example.ex: Distribute the topping evenly over the fruit.
example.tran: 将配料均匀地撒在水果上。

means.word_mean: 1. administer or bestow, as in small portions;

10. to arrange in a systematic order;

stems_affixes.word_buile: contributor[n.捐款人,贡献者,投稿者]+y……的→adj.贡献的, 捐助的
tribut给予+ary表形容词或名词→给予东西→进贡的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 贡品;颂词,称赞,[表示敬意的]礼物
stems_affixes.word_buile: tribut给予+e→n.贡品;颂词,称赞,[表示敬意的]礼物
at加强动作+tribut给予+e→[把原因]给出→归因于
attribute[v.[to]归因于,归属于 n.属性,品质,特征]+ion表名词→n.归因

stems_affixes.value_cn: 捐献, 贡献, 投稿
stems_affixes.word_buile: contribute[v.[to]贡献,捐助,捐献;投稿]+ion表名词→contribution捐献, 贡献
contribute[v.[to]贡献,捐助,捐献;投稿]+or人→n.捐款人,贡献者,投稿者
distribute[v.分发;分配;分布;配[电];[over]散布]+ion表名词→n.分发,分配;分布
re回+tribut给予+ion表名词→给回去→报复,报酬
at加强动作+tribut给予+e→[把原因]给出→归因于
con全部+tribut给予+e→全部给出→捐钱

Sentence.sentence: My children used to distribute ads.
He hires children to distribute ads in shopping centers

Even if I am on vacation in the mountains, I am eating food someone else has grown, living in a house someone else has built, wearing clothes someone else has sewn from cloth woven by others, using electricity someone else is distributing to my house.
The rush to distribute the devices worries some professors, who say that students are less likely to participate in class if they are multi-tasking.
Though its overall effect may be positive, its costs and benefits are distributed unevenly.

sentences.en: The foreman distributes the work every morning.
sentences.cn: 工头每天早晨分派工作。

sentences.en: During the war, all foods were distributed in a planned way.
sentences.cn: 在战争中, 所有的食品都按计划分配。

means.word_mean: 散发; 散播; 分布

sentences.en: Fuel resources are very unevenly distributed.
sentences.cn: 燃料资源分布很不均匀。

means.word_mean: 【商业】将(商品)推销到特定市场；将(货物)分售、运送、分送或发送给(特定地方的)顾客

sentences.en: Jack distributes computers for the computer rental service in that region.
sentences.cn: 杰克把电脑运送给那个地区的电脑出租公司。

jushi.english: The books in the library are distributed according to subjects.
jushi.chinese: 图书馆的书按科目分类。

jushi.english: These rocks are widely distributed all over this region.
jushi.chinese: 这种岩石广泛分布在这个地区。
